tracklist:
01 Distant (05:49)
02 Reflections (06:31)
03 Self Aware (05:42)
04 Unfazed (06:39)
description:
spclnch presents the first release from Australian producer and DJ Kooscha called «Reflections».
Everyone is inclined to see their own reflections in the world. After all, they are a logical continuation of us. Carefully, leisurely, calmly and harmoniously, sometimes hypnotizing, the author moves us from composition to composition, then picking up the pace, then slowing down, leaving a pleasant aftertaste. Enjoy listening!

tracklist:
01 Pulsatilla (04:19)
02 Stipae (06:20)
03 Feher Rozsa (05:45)
04 Feher Rozsa (Dancing In The Sunlight Version) (05:57)
description:
They say that only flowers live for real. Live their allotted days so desperately flowering that they know better than people of the transience of life.
Romance, magic, goodness, beauty and true love - listening to such music, we water the flowers that grow in us.
Pleasant listening.

tracklist:
01 Kpsh – Aquanaut (07:52)
02 Kpsh – Aquanaut (Alex Sfetcu Remix) (07:19)
03 Alex Sfetcu – Proud Wanderer (09:17)
04 Alex Sfetcu – Proud Wanderer (Kpsh Remix) (08:49)
description:
Any journey is nothing but a set of transitions: from one point to the second, from one state to another. People like to travel, even if they do not move at all.
We suggest you hold your breath and dive. Don't be afraid. There is only one condition: trust!

tracklist:
01 Marcibagoly – Aerosol (05:29)
02 Basicnoise – Redshift (09:38)
03 Altone – Vestiges (07:08)
04 Heavenchord – Breaks And Chords (06:33)
05 Alex Sfetcu – Celestial (08:32)
06 Marcibagoly – Aerosol (R.Hz Remix) (08:11)
07 Basicnoise – Redshift (8Lives Remix) (04:45)
08 Altone – Vestiges (Kirill Torno Remix) (07:08)
09 Heavenchord – Breaks And Chords (G-Day Remix) (06:22)
10 Alex Sfetcu – Celestial (Versilov Remix) (05:25)
description:
Wait stranger, take a look around.
Have you ever noticed how many things are happening around, that everything has its own rhythm, its sense of time and space. And all about that is interconnected. Time... It's what points the way, making you different from whom you were a moment ago. It is worth remembering, it flows in only one direction, and therefore causes such a strong interest.
Let the rhythm of time pass through you and give it free rein. And then it becomes clear that the present moment is something elusive. This is the moment when emotions, events and space merge together, when you catch yourself of thinking that the moment you are living is eternal. But only here and only now.
If you could choose which moment to pause and make it last forever, which one it would be?

In the compilation, the theme of time was used as a foundation. Each participant revealed it in its own way, original and unique. Each of them knows exactly how to stop time and grasp the moment of eternity. Pleasant journey.

Continuation can be found on hello▼strange:
hellostrange.bandcamp.com/album/time

tracklist:
01 Addicted (06:53)
02 Tranquility (08:26)
03 Tranquility (Echoton Remix) (11:34)
04 Tranquility (Asvajit Remix) (06:10)
description:
Nowadays, the energy of life pulsates to such an extent that tranquility has become a luxury.
Ask yourself: how often are you in a state of peace and harmony with yourself? Perhaps you should relax and finally open your eyes?
We have what you need for that.

A portion of minimalism, glitch and all sorts of digital artifacts from Drifted, complete with remixes from Echoton and Asvajit.

tracklist:
01 No Change (07:03)
02 Outside (06:16)
03 Outside (Asvajit Remix) (07:32)
description:
Your internal world is your abode. These endless corridors are like the nooks and crannies of the megapolis that hides a lot of mysteries.
Where the boundaries of the inner world end, there begins secret and the multifaceted external world with its unstable atmosphere and stories. These worlds have no clearly defined framework, and one hardly can exist without the other one. Only plunging into the outside world, only hiding in the unknown space, you can extend the territory of your own megapolis.
Returning to your domain, take a look around, because the avenue of your consciousness has already expanded.

tracklist:
01 Elastic Dub (07:12)
02 Phantom (06:42)
03 Algorithm (06:56)
04 Algorithm (Kooscha Remix) (07:39)
description:
You're standing on a cold iron beam and you can't believe your eyes. You see only stars, nebulae and total darkness. Concentration is more important now than ever before, otherwise there is a risk of falling and dissolving into infinite space. But what is it around? Space? Another dimension? Or maybe it's a tunnel full of your fears and memories?
Yeah, we all have something to hide, and you're not an exception. You can run as fast as you can, at light speed, but remember, you can't run away from yourself.
It's all about what's between the lines of yourself.
It seems like you're stuck here in the middle of your fear cosmos forever. And you know what? It's the truth. Your thoughts will find you. Wherever you're hiding, wherever you're trying to go.
Those distant stars, that frightening darkness... That's all is you.
Now you understand: there is only one way - to move forward.

tracklist:
01 Barn Door Slam (06:27)
02 Barn Door Slam (Basicnoise Reconstruction) (07:58)
03 Illusory Fog (07:13)
04 Illusory Fog (Kooscha Remix) (07:17)
description:
Three dub Musketeers, nobly animating the ubiquitous flow of reverberations, skillfully fence with micro-textures. Desolated melancholy and dotted rhythm emphasize the formlessness of ambient structures, causing emotional restraint.
The limited edition record by Vincent Raude (Upwellings), a French cultivator of deep-sea dub techno streams, comes from the bowels of analog synthesizers. Its sound makes sense and steadily penetrates into the auditory range, expressing the interactive-spatial evolution of music.
Peter Fanai (Basicnoise), a lover of subtle dubby jams, producing from late 90s and consistent, methodical electronic pedant from Sydney Kyryl Polozyuk (Kooscha) made a vinyl contribution.

«Once you have chosen your path, you will become it. The once perplexing vicissitudes of fate will be taken as a starting point. We are here and continue to see incredible in the usual!»

tracklist:
01 Save Me (04:13)
02 Save Me (Vøsne Redemption) (09:48)
03 Save Me (Kpsh Remix) (06:13)
04 Save Me (Alex Sfetcu Remix) (08:08)
description:
So this is the limit.
Energy flow inside has reached a critical point. There is just one moment before the explosion - when the Universe arrives at a balance. This feeling is like a full of resolving but unconscious and spontaneous.
Explosion is natural need in order to give birth to something new and powerful. Like a bolt of lightning during the storm, energy flows will come out with its deadly power.
Quiet tension, just calm before the storm - this exact point of fragile balance. Just one thing is inevitable - energy flow will come out.

tracklist:
01 Celestial Beings (08:56)
02 Celestial Beings (Echoton Remix) (09:18)
03 Sinapse (05:57)
description:
Endless space of the Universe help us when we want to disappear completely. At this moment it seem to be like only open space can give us feeling of safety when there is nothing and nobody but you. Vacuum.
But what if we seriously imagine that we have an opportunity to be all alone among endless space… Will we be in safety for real? Do we exist?
Maybe we are nothing but the product of our own imagination and there is nothing around in the reality?
Just mysterious emptiness and fear.

tracklist:
01 Alexander Bogdanov - Mercury In Retrograde (07:09)
02 Alexander Bogdanov - Recognize It (07:22)
03 Special Zip – Arctic Dub (05:12)
04 Special Zip – Wormhole (06:20)
description:
Contact
Get ready and take the seatbelt off.
No, this is not because of the danger that has passed. Rather it is in order to rein in the weightlessness.
Who says that the Contact is going to take place in our natural environment? We will try to be ready for that.
The unknown frightens and at the same time it envelops with attempts to find out what is that.
However, we are going to learn for sure who or what we are dealing with, as it is inevitable. So take it slow because there is a little eternity to spare.

tracklist:
01 Kooscha – Self Aware (05:42)
02 Marcibagoly – Feher Rozsa (05:45)
03 Kpsh – Aquanaut (Alex Sfetcu Remix) (07:19)
04 Altone – Vestiges (07:08)
05 Basicnoise – Redshift (8Lives Remix) (04:45)
06 Drifted – Tranquility (08:26)
07 Maclab – Outside (Asvajit Remix) (07:32)
08 Skytechnic – Phantom (06:42)
09 Upwellings – Barn Door Slam (06:27)
10 Thomas Carmody & Khlev – Save Me (Vøsne Redemption) (09:48)
11 Zgomot – Celestial Beings (Echoton Remix) (09:18)
12 Alexander Bogdanov – Mercury In Retrograde (07:09)
13 Special Zip – Arctic Dub (05:12)
description: spclnch proudly presents a very special collection of carefully selected and compiled tracks for 2019. This is a small gift for all the listeners who support us on our journey. Let's spread love together.

tracklist:
01 Singularity (06:24)
02 Spheres Connection (05:46)
03 Under Stunning (07:12)
04 Side By Side (05:46)
description:
It is our nature to chart dividing lines in order to adjust everything around us. There is a reason because everybody has their own limits. To define boundaries, to make laws and establish the rules of the game - that is so like to the way we go.
Possibly, it is necessary need to define ourselves as independent entity and make scope of allowable things.
That’s why we are so different.
That’s why we are so similar.

tracklist:
01 Soliton (07:20)
02 Lyft (06:10)
03 Motivus (05:38)
04 Motivus (Schulz Audio Remix) (04:53)
05 Motivus (Heavenchord Remix) (06:48)
description:
Every creation has its creator, however, we concentrate on different colors of events once we encounter with art.
But does the artist really match with the messages he reflects in his work? What if not?
One could be deeply disappointed due to ones high expectations. Art can be referred to some ideals, while people are never perfect.

tracklist:
01 Nostalgia (04:28)
02 Wish I Could (06:13)
03 Floating In Deep Space (05:21)
04 Wish I Could (Special Zip remix) (06:46)
description:
Sweet sorrow or absolute happiness can knock on our door with the album of memories. Nobody will ask us do we need that right now or not - the injection of nostalgia takes the effect of tranquilizer in order to let us see the world in which we had been living some time ago.

Fairy tales from past remind us about the events that were happening so long time ago. Later, even not the most pleasant memories somehow are wrapped in serene foil forming the integrated whole in the lifestream.

tracklist:
01 RNG (08:48)
02 Espace (06:34)
03 Everyday (06:56)
04 Everyday (Alexander Bogdanov remix) (06:56)
05 Everyday (Drifting.Dubs remix) (07:18)
description:
Everything changes, but not immediately. Conditions, distances…
Whether it is red sunset going below the horizon, or whether it is space satellite flight so far from the visible area.
Only later changes impact can be observed. Most often it is achieved by little but daily work. This is the way how stars are forming and planets are moving. The difference is how much time does it need to see the tangible result.

tracklist:
01 Upwellings – Dark Cloud Riddim (06:42)
02 Kooscha – Kenopsia (07:21)
03 Ohrwert – Vade (06:45)
04 Alexander Bogdanov – My Dear Ketu (07:19)
05 Echoton – Depth Of Field (10:10)
06 Schulz Audio – Turing Test (06:09)
07 Basicnoise – Sequential (06:24)
08 Thomas Carmody – Morning Fog (Skytechnic remix) (08:11)
09 Special Zip – Simple (04:47)
10 Marcibagoly – Mystery Of Love (07:18)
11 Heavenchord – Skoro Vesna (08:41)
12 Drifted – Sinister Dub (03:08)
description: Life is nothing but illustrated collection of stories that naturally updates itself. Often it happens quietly and only some time after it can be found that compilation has become thicker and brighter.

If only we could go back to childhood…
Just for a moment take a look at yourself so small through the window of your house.
What makes this little human happy? There is nothing better than feeling that the most important people are here, right next to you. At this touching moment there happens divine miracle - Love.
Have things really changed since then? Maybe.
However something has remained unchanged and comes to visit us occasionally - it's a belief in goodness, something that we have from the very beginning.
This is our little secret out of time.
The main thing - to trust in that.

tracklist:
01 Vela Dust (06:42)
02 Crossing Dumbbell (06:58)
03 Nebula Escape (06:27)
04 Nebula Escape (Fingers In The Noise remix) (06:12)
description:
The Universe possibly wouldn't have any sense if the space wasn't permeated by stardust. Its particles are in motion for millions of years conceiving nebulas, star systems and galaxies which are eventually going to return to their initial state.
Everything around is weaved from the same star matter, first creating and then destroying. And everything cycles and repeats again and again.
This is the inevitability, the law of existence.
We only get to observe.

tracklist:
01 Under The Shadow Of Saturn (05:31)
02 The Coldest Year (05:25)
03 The Coldest Year (Marcibagoly remix) (05:55)
description:
When it comes to a starship, it often seems to be something huge. However, once it comes closer to the Saturn, giant size of the interstellar vehicle turns to atomic particles. Great shadow of the planet envelops spaceship making it transparent in total darkness, like immersing it to the chambers of depression, so cold and distant.
The mind falls down to infinity when faced with thousand years objects. Probably, living beings will never understand what does it feel like a hundred million years long life travelling through endless empty space.

tracklist:
a Mind Machine (09:48)
b1 Theta Rhythm (08:23)
b2 Theta Rhythm (Basicnoise remix) (06:35)
description:
The suborbital German brotherhood Echoton, united by free creative intelligence and mutual expansion of the musical range, deciphers the mystery of the mind machine.
Detail-organic, avalanche-like electroacoustics of Alexander and Michael rushes to the top of the console futurism. The flow of sound, though not always obvious, manipulations creates a sense of dynamic balance.
The incomprehensibly abstract environment, saturated with biology and meaning of digital structures, finds its culmination in a Remix from the master of uncompromising grooves — Basicnoise! His boundless space Odysseys are echoed by a deep bass that abolishes ephemeral musical constructions.

tracklist:
01 Moments (10:41)
02 Restless (06:31)
03 Journey (06:51)
04 Journey (Upwellings remix) (08:00)
description:
Spacelunch and his loyal friend Cat are thousands of light-years away from the galaxy they once thought was their own. Obsessed with the thirst for discoveries of the depths of extraterrestrial civilizations, they are wandering in search of unexplained phenomena from different worlds.

Looking back to their roots, space collectors want to get a different view of the origin of the universe. Although it was impossible to say exactly in what dimension their story began, all these journeys have made sense just now.

tracklist:
01 Elevation (10:07)
02 Shortcut Road (06:43)
03 Last Night (07:43)
04 Shortcut Road (Schulz Audio remix) (06:40)
description:
Is that real that the Solar System looks different from Saturn... Possibly the reason of distortion is light refraction in gravitational field. But why then we don't feel it? Are we really able to feel the moment's flow in space?

It's hardly possible that Cat could think about this kind of stuff during his tries in simple exercises for balancing without inherent grace. So, what is it? Elevation or just weightless...

One thing is for sure - the only gravitational pull between them is music that brought so far.

tracklist:
01 Forma (09:16)
02 Dehn Invariant (08:58)
03 Normals (07:10)
04 Dehn Invariant (Altone remix) (06:18)
05 Normals (DP-6 remix) (06:10)
description:
The long-standing dispute has still persisted, fueling the excessive interest in finding the artifact in the minds of avid friends. It's time to start exploring the sky and the blurry, bright streaks of constellations passing by.

Cat’s partner's habit of putting his feet up on the spaceship's dashboard has sometimes disturbed him, but it hasn't stopped him from briskly sorting through the options in their traditional “Last Letter” game, where words denoted instances of sound, time, and space, rather than the usual Earth cities.

A long journey is coming and it is unknown which form of matter will be encountered this time.

tracklist:
01 Igneous (07:21)
02 Metamorphic (07:29)
03 Sedimentary (08:00)
04 Sedimentary (Alexander Bogdanov remix) (06:27)
description:
Due to the impact, the spaceship's landing struts dug into the hard surface, forming a dense dust cloud around them. They departed too far from their intended trajectory and made a forced hard landing. A critical dose of meteor fragments damaged one of the engines. It was necessary to fix the damage as soon as possible or to get an alternative type of fuel.

After looking around them, the space travelers began to move towards the mysterious craters almost by feel. Suddenly, the ground got out from under their feet. Due to poor visibility, the rush led to an expectable outcome. "Great, we're trapped!", - Cat looked at his companion from under his brows, insistently hinting at a clear explanation of what was happening.

– This is a Planet of Mineralization's Dubs, my friend.
– Hm...
– Its interior consists of metamorphic deposits formed by layers of two types of fossils: igneous and sedimentary.
– Mineralization's Dubs?!
– I don't know, what's bothering you?
– At least the fact that we are waist-deep in a swamp with an incomprehensible viscous substance!
– We'll get out, don't doubt it. There are still many mysteries to solve in the Universe. Just focus on these sound waves, can you hear them?

tracklist:
01 RTW1350 (06:51)
02 Orlan 19 (06:47)
03 Pattern Juggler (07:30)
04 The Alien Script (06:18)
05 The Alien Script (Basicnoise remix) (07:40)
description:
The alien scenario was unfolding very dynamically, so the daring pilgrims decided to look into one quaint place where you can hide from the universal bustle, take a breath and enjoy the spatial modeling. By the way, it helps to recover after critical overloads through fine motor skills.

Welcome to the heavenly body \"Orlan 19\". Once it was assigned an ordinal number, and it got this name because of its ultra-low gravity. Obviously, this \"dwarf\" became an attraction and just a recreational area for many nomads. Its atmosphere is literally packed with thoughtfully hovering objects of various configurations. A kind of metaphysical equilibrium. Here it is customary to not only enjoy the abundance of entertainment, but also the thoughts about where the consciousness leads us in search of its home.

Deftly juggling patterns, the technologist grabbed an experimental sample labeled RTW1350, which, thanks to its composition and consistency, easily gives the appearance of a basketball.
Catch - the next throw is yours!

tracklist:
01 Zeta Potential (07:56)
02 Molecular Orbitals (07:26)
03 Delta Minus (07:43)
04 Zeta Potential (Luss remix) (08:22)
05 Zeta Potencial (Special Zip remix) (07:25)
description:
It's hard to imagine how even experienced adventurers envied these travellers, bound by an invisible, strong thread of excitement for discovery. But what will they become: a collection of fears and questions or the embodiment of a real experience? The cabin shook, the sensors screeched in unison, announcing extreme overload, a bright flash! Emptiness. What is it: strange whispers, snatches of sounds, noises, echoes of the frightening unknown rang in my ears.

It soon turned out that riding the waves of atomic-molecular flow is not so scary. Quantum teleportation is quite a common process for those who have fallen into the cold embrace of a black hole. Random formulas, geometric progressions, and a detailed model of the universe pop up in your mind as if at someone's command. Suddenly, a strange silhouette flashed past - perhaps a clot of dark matter, or perhaps someone got caught in an endless cycle and rushed with great speed into a parallel dimension. The main thing is not to break into particles from such a swirl and strong rotation.

The intergalactic tornado calmed down and the image stabilized. Just think, until recently Cat could not imagine such a story. His eyes widened in surprise. Looking at each other, the friends realized that everything had happened for a reason, they were being watched...

tracklist:
01 Waxing Moon (05:35)
02 Full Moon (05:56)
03 Waning Moon (05:27)
04 Full Moon (Asvajit remix) (06:54)
05 Full Moon (Addex remix) (09:10)
description:
After a decent corpuscular thrashing, the calibration of the control systems went in normal mode.
When the readings of the instrument were analysed, there was an enthusiastic voice on board: "Thermoregulation is normal, cap! Electromagnetic induction and differential change of the phase integral are calculated! Full speed ahead!"

After passing through the dense asteroid belt, the broken testers found that a kinetic teleport spat out their aircraft near the orbital station "Research Institute of Cybernetics", where an unscheduled study of the dynamic modulations and illumination of the moon was carried out using ultrasonic transducers.

With amazing ease, they ended up in the center of scientific research, in the middle of a landfill filled with splitting blasters and life-size holographic models. The mechanics of this action had an absolutely mesmerizing effect, making anyone who witnessed it freeze in amazement. The slow-motion fashion show of the prototypes reflected the metamorphoses of the growing (as they say among Earthlings), full and waning moon, reminding us of the grandiosity of the internal changes of each of us and of the magnetic integrity they possess.

tracklist:
01 Ohrwert – Soliton (07:20)
02 Marcibagoly – Wish I Could (Special Zip remix) (06:46)
03 Schulz Audio – Everyday (06:56)
04 Heavenchord – Two (10:00)
05 Upwellings – Nebula Escape (06:27)
06 Flying Cobra – The Coldest Year (Marcibagoly remix) (05:55)
07 Luss – Journey (Upwellings remix) (08:00)
08 Alexander Bogdanov – Elevation (10:07)
09 Kooscha – Forma (09:16)
10 Upwellings – Igneous (07:21)
11 Subset –The Alien Script (Basicnoise remix) (07:40)
12 Liuos – Zeta Potential (Luss remix) (08:22)
13 Schulz Audio – Waxing Moon (05:35)
description:
By tradition, spclnch is proud to present a very special collection of carefully selected and compiled tracks for 2020. This is a small gift for all the listeners who support us on our journey. Let's continue to spread love together.

Thank you to all our incredible producers and all the people who make the label what it is.

tracklist:
01 Bubble Pattern (07:24)
02 Cold Draft (06:24)
03 Rusted House (06:04)
04 Wet Format (07:35)
05 Cold Draft (Federsen remix) (07:37)
description:
A beam of intense light drew the professor's attention to the hypno-spiral, which had become his first goal in studying astronomical objects of the "Quasar" class. However, everyone has their own desires. Cat, for example, tried to comprehend passionarity and look at the reflection of what was happening. The genre scenes that unfolded before the eyes of the experimenters went beyond the 3d dimension. Bubble pattern, cold draft, rusted house, wet format – they seemed to be on the verge of insanity.

Although in the past the Spacelunch studied at the Department of Experimental Phonetics and Speech Synthesis, the adaptation of consciousness was still difficult. The answers to the inner questions turned into a swarm of sound isotopes. Space was shifting, going deep, rotating and stretching in all possible directions, reducing all efforts to concentrate almost to zero. No wonder, because music is not just a technical object, but an ideological principle. The delta dimension, which is full of spectral lines, is clearly not the place for a logical routine with complex calculations - the auditory stream expresses something more, just trust the sensations.

tracklist:
a1 Consequences (06:12)
a2 Consequences (Echoton remix) (06:40)
b1 Subsequence (07:37)
b2 Subsequence (Kooscha remix) (07:14)
description:
Having won approval and success in its debut release, the spclnch vinyl series continues with the release of a second record from Wiesbaden producer – Peter Fanai.
Weighty, spacious bass pleiades fill the sound field, erase the consequences of duality and, flowing into the viscous full-bodied substance of verified sound design, it would seem that they will momentarily shift the tectonic plates of the electronic genre.
Maestro Basicnoise is again involved in the spatial enrichment of textural proportions of reverberation and percussion. This time, their sequence runs under the quality mark of the Australian-German collaboration. The accurate Kooscha warms up the sensorics with elegant dance manipulations and a distinct rhythm, and the related association Echoton traditionally introduces a tart concentrate of meaningful thoughts.
The rich aftertaste of variable electronic abstractions takes the subconscious and musical outlook to a different plane.
Now you are more than an observer.

tracklist:
01 Illusion Fusion (07:14)
02 Wanderer Fusion (09:01)
03 Golden Rule (07:48)
04 Temporal Fusion (07:46)
05 Temporal Fusion (Altone remix) (07:27)
description:
They didn't come here for nothing. Spacelunch was promising the merge with energy-informational thinking substances at the level of elementary particles. The crystal sound spread like ectoplasm along the walls of the reflecting vessel of the universe. Drama and the eager grin of adventure have slowed down, bowing its heads in submission to the convergence of musical exuberance. Meditation on the event horizon lit the torch of sharpened perception of all the amplitude shifts.

Dubby substrate absorbed every scrap of the all-pervading ether. This meant that the indefatigable pioneers had harnessed the elements, becoming the bearers of important, extracted knowledge. From now on, their bioresonators are as precisely tuned as possible to the condensation of acoustic waves, which, like a compass, will point the way to the probabilities that emit a powerful impulse. Space stalking and audio transcription are being taken to the new dimensions.

tracklist:
01 Minimal Antagonist (06:47)
02 Bingo (08:05)
03 Ufologist (06:44)
04 Ufologist (Asvajit remix) (06:30)
05 Bingo (Nigel Perera remix) (06:56)
description:
Bingo! The encounter with the minimal antagonist, who was following the irreconcilable ufologists during the quantum leap, was so unexpected that they barely realized how they switched bodies.

The endless maze of stairs and abandoned, winding corridors of the aerospace corporation was confusing due to spatial reversion. The cuttlefish's minions, the shadow phantoms, followed them step by step like its ubiquitous giant tentacles, crawling underfoot and along the walls.

Cat 007 fastidiously refused to put up with the role of prisoners and, grabbing his friend, blasting well-aimed, cutting shots from the service blaster, left a couple of decent holes in the energy field of annoying creatures. Without a doubt, it became obvious that interplanetary explorers were being hunted.

tracklist:
01 Jet Stream (05:44)
02 We're Flying (06:48)
03 Snowstorm (05:28)
04 Jet Stream (R.Hz remix) (10:28)
05 Snowstorm (R.Hz remix) (09:17)
description:
After passing through the sights of the clouds of galactic dust, the patrol cruiser brought the brave, hard-to-get-out-of-trouble friends to the Andromeda Nebula. An astrophysical textbook with the basics of meta-cognitive therapy is of a great help in planning new searches in the depths of the celestial web, reboot and dream circulation.

Cat performs a ritual of debugging vibration fields with the help of immersive mantras. Their light, airy reflections have long been used to eliminate nonverbal attacks on consciousness. The multidimensional immersion in the cradle of sound sensorics becomes tangible.

tracklist:
01 Obsessive Prevailing
02 Dub Dimensions
03 Clever Shooter
04 Distress Signal
05 Dub Dimensions (Schulz Audio remix)
06 Clever Shooter (Kooscha remix)
description:
Unearthing the ruins of a vanished Martian civilization has led to a portal to an apocalyptic, aggressive world, where the echoes of race battles thundered, flames blazed everywhere and demonic priests pestered. The previous research team left behind only SOS signals, frightening with their helplessness and encrypted on the flight recorder as a warning to all outsiders about the inadmissibility of staying here.

The audio messages contain information about strange pataphysical phenomena, suspicious accidents, and a mass obsession of the expedition members. Rare specimens of the fauna of the infernal dimension, collected at the cost of many human lives, pointed to the main mystery – a sarcophagus with ancient writings sealed with an occult pentagram. The die is cast, what remains is being patient and count on luck.
